# \<xsystems-flickr\>

Collection of elements to obtain data from the Flickr API and to present this data.

> *n.b. `xsystems-flickr` is still in beta.*

Supported Flickr API resources:

- Photos
- Photosets

There are elements to present the following types of data:

- Photos
- Photosets
- List of photosets

For more information, please read the [documentation](http://xsystems.github.io/xsystems-flickr).
